I forgot..."/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/faceDirection farmer 2 true/warp farmer 64 15/pause 300/emote farmer 16/pause 300/speak Emily "Oh! @! Sorry, dear."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Emily "I was going to drop some stuff by my old house for Haley and pick up a few things I left there today.#$b#I didn't want to wake you...you look so peaceful when you sleep.$l"/pause 500/speak Emily "I was going to go, but I just remembered that I left something inside."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/emote Emily 40/pause 250/speak Emily "Hey, hon...$l"/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Emily "Do you wanna come along? I could show you some of my old things...$l#$b#It could just be a little 'us' time.#$b#Spending time with my amazing husband... I couldn't envision a more perfect day!^Spending time with my amazing wife... I couldn't envision a more perfect day!"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Emily "Well, dear?"/pause 1000/question fork0 "Go on a date with Emily?#Yes#No"/fork dateYes/playMusic none/pause 1000/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "Oh...$s#$b#Too busy again?$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 3 true/pause 1000/emote Emily 40/pause 400/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 400/speak Emily "It's okay hon, we'll spend time together some other day. You just get back to work."/pause 800/move farmer 1 0 3/move Emily 0 -1 1/pause 500/speak Emily "I'll just grab what I forgot, and head out, I guess.$s#$b#On second thought, maybe I won't go anywhere today...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Emily -100 -100/pause 2000/end dialogue Emily "Don't worry, @. I'm not upset.#$b#I know you're busy...I knew what I was getting into when I married you.#$b#"
Entries.dateYes: pause 200/addMailReceived emilyGemDateAgree/emote Emily 20/pause 500/speak Emily "Splendid! This will be so much fun, @!$h#$b#I'm just gonna grab what I forgot and then I'll head out.#$b#Just swing by my old house after you've done your chores!$h#$b#I can't wait to see you, honey!$l"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 3/move Emily 0 -1 1/playSound doorClose/warp Emily -100 -100/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 2 2 true/end dialogue Emily "I'm gonna head to Haley's soon.#$b#Don't forget to swing by anytime, dear!"

Entries.1116016/n emilyGemDateAgree: EmilyTheme/17 6/farmer 16 20 0 Emily 18 7 3 Placeholder1DN 22 6 2/skippable/addObject 17 6 089 1/pause 2500/shake Emily 150/playSound trashcan/removeObject 17 6/pause 500/textAboveHead Emily "Done!"/pause 750/speak Emily "That's all!"/pause 200/emote Emily 28/pause 250/speak Emily "*Sigh*... I wish Haley wasn't so messy..$s#$b#I agreed to let her use my room after I moved out, but the least she could do is keep it clean...$s"/pause 500/emote Placeholder1DN 16 true/playSound money/pause 600/emote Emily 16/move Emily 4 0 0/pause 200/emote Emily 40/pause 200/message "'1 New Unread Email'"/pause 300/speak Emily "Ooh, I wonder who it's from!"/pause 500/shake Emily 150/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/message "Subject: How are you doing love?"/pause 300/message "From: Sandy"/pause 400/emote Emily 32/pause 300/message "'Splendid day Em! It's been a while since I've heard from you. Hope you're doing well! If you ever feel lonely always remember you've got a good friend out here in the Desert.'"/pause 500/speak Emily "Oh, Sandy! You're so sweet!"/pause 500/message "Although, I don't suppose you'll feel lonely anytime soon, considering you got married to that attractive farmer, {{PlayerName}}."/pause 200/message "Come on, Em! You think I didn't know? I still keep up to date with the news in the Valley. Did you forget to tell me, love? I'm so happy for you dear!"/pause 500/speak Emily "Oh no! I completely forgot to tell Sandy about my wedding!$s"/pause 500/speak Emily "I better plan a visit with her right away. Let me respond to this."/pause 500/shake Emily 150/playSound mouseClick/speak Emily "'My dearest Sandy,'#$b#'I am so sorry that I forgot to tell you about @.'#$b#'I was so swept up in them that I completely forgot to tell you.'#$b#'Please don't feel left out. I feel terrible for what I have done and I will come visit you as soon as possible.'"/move farmer 0 -7 0 true/pause 500/speak Emily "'As for @...'$l#$b#'He's the best thing that has ever happened to me.'$l^'She's the best thing that has ever happened to me.'$l#$b#'He makes me feel safe, happy, and I treasure every day with him. I love his-'$l^'She makes me feel safe, happy, and I treasure every day with her. I love her-'$l"/doAction 16 12/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 16 true/move farmer 0 -5 1/pause 200/friendship Emily {{FriendBonus}}/speak Emily "@! Dear, you're here!$h"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 200/speak Emily "I was just chatting with my friend Sandy about you."/pause 300/emote farmer 60/speak Emily "I told her that you're the most honest, loyal, smart, brave, and most amazing person I know.$l"/pause 300/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Emily "Oh, hey! I wanted to show you something."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 2/move Emily -4 0 2/faceDirection farmer 3 true/move Emily 0 1 3/move Emily -5 0 3/pause 700/shake Emily 250/playSound pickUpItem/pause 250/move Emily 1 0 0/move Emily 0 -3 1/move Emily 3 0 2/pause 300/shake Emily 250/playSound pickUpItem/addObject 17 6 {{Random:060, 062, 064, 068, 070, 072 |key=emilyGem}} 1/pause 300/move farmer -2 0 3/textAboveHead Emily "Come, look closer!"/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 1 2 true/speak Emily "This was one of my 'Sadness Cleansing Gems'.$3"/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Emily "Whenever I felt sad or lonely after a long day of work at the Saloon, or after fighting with Haley, I would take one of these and capture my sad feelings inside them.$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Emily "I thought that by capturing the negative energy in these crystals, I could keep them hidden, away from the world.$3#$b#I didn't want any negative energy to be released onto others because of me.$s#$b#And in a way, these crystals were also me hiding my negative memories...$s"/pause 500/speak Emily "There's a crystal from the first night me and Haley were by ourselves after our parents left...$s#$b#There's a crystal from the night I broke Clint's heart...$s#$b#And then there's my latest crystal...$s"/pause 400/faceDirection Emily 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Emily "@, the last time I used one of these crystals to capture my feelings was the night before we first met.$3#$b#I just had a huge fight with Haley, and I just felt so alone.$s"/pause 500/speak Emily "But then you came into my life, @. I knew from the moment we met you had a positive, loving aura...$l#$b#I knew our destinies would intertwine...$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 1000/speak Emily "Here, @. I want you to have this crystal."/pause 300/shake Emily 250/playSound pickUpItem/removeObject 17 6/pause 700/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/shake Emily 250/playSound pickUpItem/speak Emily "[{{Random:060, 062, 064, 068, 070, 072 |key=emilyGem}}] Think of it not as me burdening you with my negative emotions...$s#$b#But as me giving my amazing husband my emotions to protect and keep safe.$l^But as me giving my amazing wife my emotions to protect and keep safe.$l"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Emily "Thank you for coming, @. I'm glad I got to go on this trip down memory lane with you."/pause 1000/animate Emily false true 100 33/animate farmer false true 100 101/playSound pickUpItem/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/stopAnimation Emily/pause 700/emote Emily 20/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 900/emote Emily 40/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 200/speak Emily "Hey, @...$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Emily "Haley shouldn't be back for a couple more hours...$l#$b#We have the house to ourselves...$l"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 7/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 3/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 2 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changePortrait Emily Beach/pause 400/playSound doorClose/pause 3000/speak Emily "I've never had this much fun before, @.$l#$b#Let's do this again, okay?$l"/end dialogueWarpOut Emily "That was nice...$l#$b#Oh, and remember to keep that gem safe!"
